content: NeuroStar system revenue was $4.6 million, up 64% over the fourth quarter of 2021. The U.S. treatment session revenue was an all-time record of $12.5 million, up 11% over the fourth quarter of 2021. Total revenue for the fourth quarter was $18.2 million, an increase of 21% over fourth quarter 2021 revenue of $15 million. Treatment session revenue was $12.5 million, an increase of 11% over fourth quarter 2021 revenue of $11.2 million. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open.
